description.value:
Granted Powers: You find solace in the green, can grow defensive thorns, and can communicate with plants.

  • 5th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.nqfoy30smshc3c6w]{Wall Of Thorns}
  • 6th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.ipc85wy0f0lmr0l4]{Repel Wood}
  • 7th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.qt0xmkag6ahtvesm]{Animate Plants}
  • 8th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.szzwom7utm3sm15z]{Control Plants}
  • 9th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.bp4s030vn5iwwf58]{Shambler}
